definition: second month of a season/middle/intermediate/second amongst brothers
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
Midsummer night's dream, comedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]

sentences.english: Thankfully, they are seasonal and will pass by mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 可幸的是，沙塵暴是季節性的，仲夏之後就會停止。

sentences.english: "A Midsummer Night's Dream"had stood the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 《仲夏夜之夢》經住了時間的考驗。

sentences.english: Green is the dominant theme of midsummer at the China International Exhibition Center.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏時節，中國國際展覽中心綠意盎然。

sentences.english: It is the middle of the summer, but there is an unseasonal mist pressing against the windowpanes .
sentences.chinese: 現在是仲夏，窗玻璃上卻蒙着一層不合時令的霧氣。

sentences.english: It is particularly difficult to bear up against the midsummer heat.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏酷暑尤其令人難熬。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, the wild crabapple blossoms filled valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏時節，野生海棠花開滿溝谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, full of wild crabapple valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏時節，野生海棠開滿溝谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: The Arab Spring continues even now in midsummer.
sentences.chinese: 儘管這樣，阿拉伯的春天也到了仲夏。

sentences.english: But now back in mid-summer London, I can see that people have regained confidence.
sentences.chinese: 如今仲夏的倫敦，人們又恢復了往日的從容和自信。

sentences.english: And the house itself was a fit guardian for all the beauty of this heart of summer.
sentences.chinese: 而房子本身就是這仲夏的一切美景的適宜的保衛者。

sentences.english: Please enjoy the drama club rehearsals blue drama midsummer night's dream.
sentences.chinese: 請欣賞藍天話劇社排演的話劇《仲夏夜之夢》。

sentences.english: Clematis wilt most frequently shows up in early to mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 鐵線蓮枯萎病常常發生在初夏到仲夏這段時期。

sentences.english: The best time to see the alpine forget-me-not is midsummer, from late June to late July.
sentences.chinese: 欣賞它的最好時節是仲夏，從六月底到七月底。

sentences.english: Eggs with dill are a traditional Midsummer food.
sentences.chinese: 加小茴香的雞蛋是傳統的仲夏節食品。

sentences.english: The old aged cannot bear up against the midsummer heat this year.
sentences.chinese: 老年人不勝忍受今年的仲夏酷暑。

sentences.english: Midsummer rain after rainbow across backdrop.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏雨過之後彩虹跨越天幕。

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
final month of summer (i.e. sixth month of lunar calendar)
second month of autumn/8th month of the lunar calendar
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Xiazhi or Summer Solstice, 10th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st June-6th July
